task.title: Hardcoded Supabase API Key Security Vulnerability
task.description: Critical security issue: Hardcoded Supabase public API key exposed in /root/agents/src/integrations/supabase/client.ts source code. This creates API key exposure risk and potential security breach. Immediate fix required to move to environment variables.

recommendation.message: No significant duplicates detected. Safe to proceed.

reasons: Similar resolved issues in Knowledge Graph
